list.question: Who is Thanos in the context of Squid Game Thanos?
list.answer: In 'Squid Game Thanos' Season 2, Thanos is a character portrayed by Choi Seung-hyun, also known as T.O.P from the K-pop band BigBang. Thanos is depicted as an erratic rapper with purple hair who participates in the deadly games.

list.question: What is the objective of Squid Game Thanos?
list.answer: Squid Game Thanos is an online multiplayer survival game that combines elements from the 'Squid Game Thanos' series and the Marvel universe. Players compete in various challenges inspired by both franchises, aiming to be the last one standing.

list.question: How can I start playing Squid Game Thanos?
list.answer: To begin playing, visit our website, create an account or play as a guest, and select the 'Play Game' option. You'll be matched with other players to compete in a series of challenges.

list.question: Is Squid Game Thanos free to play?
list.answer: Yes, Squid Game Thanos is free to play. However, there are optional in-game purchases available for cosmetic items and other enhancements.

list.question: Can I play Squid Game Thanos with friends?
list.answer: Absolutely! You can invite friends to join the same game room and compete together in various challenges.

list.question: What are the system requirements for Squid Game Thanos?
list.answer: Squid Game Thanos is a browser-based game. For optimal performance, we recommend using an updated web browser on a desktop or laptop with a stable internet connection.

list.question: Are there leaderboards in Squid Game Thanos?
list.answer: Yes, the game features global leaderboards that track wins, achievements, and scores, allowing you to see how you rank against other players worldwide.

list.question: How often is Squid Game Thanos updated?
list.answer: We regularly update the game with new content, game modes, and features to keep the experience fresh and engaging for our players.

list.question: Is there an age restriction to play Squid Game Thanos?
list.answer: Due to the game's content, it is recommended for players aged 16 and above.

list.question: How can I report a bug or issue in the game?
list.answer: If you encounter any issues or bugs, please contact our support team through the 'Contact Us' section on our website, providing detailed information about the problem.

privacyPolicy.1-h1: Privacy Policy for Squid Game Thanos
privacyPolicy.1-p: Squid Game Thanos operates the website https://squidgamethanos.com and is committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy outlines how we handle information when you use our online game.
privacyPolicy.2-p-1: We do not collect any personal identification information from users. Our service is designed to be used without requiring personal data.
privacyPolicy.2-p-3: We collect non-personal data through web cookies, including usage statistics and preferences, to improve our service and user experience. This may include your display settings and customization preferences.
privacyPolicy.3-p: Any collected non-personal data is used solely to enhance the functionality of our game and improve user experience. We do not share any data with third parties.
privacyPolicy.6-p: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@squidgamethanos.com.

termsConditions.1-h1: Terms of Service for Squid Game Thanos
termsConditions.1-p: Welcome to Squid Game Thanos. By accessing our website (https://squidgamethanos.com), you agree to these Terms of Service. Our service provides an online multiplayer survival game.
termsConditions.2-p: All content on the Website, including the game, design elements, and related materials, is the intellectual property of Squid Game Thanos unless otherwise stated. The text content created by users remains their property.
termsConditions.3-p: Our service is provided for playing online multiplayer games. Users are responsible for their conduct and should not use the service for any illegal or harmful purposes.
termsConditions.4-p: These Terms shall be governed by applicable laws, without regard to conflicts of law principles.
termsConditions.5-p: Squid Game Thanos reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the website. Your continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of any changes.
termsConditions.6-p: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@squidgamethanos.com.
termsConditions.last-p: By using Squid Game Thanos, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to these Terms of Service.
